title: Saint Seiya: Next Dimension - Meiou Shinwa
original_name: 聖闘士星矢 NEXT DIMENSION 冥王神話
sinopse: In 1990, in Elysium; the five saints Seiya, Hyoga, Shun, Shiryu and Ikki are battling the god Hades. During the battle, Hades starts remembering that he has seen Seiya's face before and comes to the conclusion that he faced him before, and thus the story begins...
